text: OK, I hadn’t looked at that in a long time, I thought it was limited to official or “quasi” official sites

elements.text: OK, I hadn’t looked at that in a long time, I thought it was limited to official or “quasi” official sites

text: Right but we would only want to direct folks to our official channels

elements.text: Right but we would only want to direct folks to our official channels

text: What’s the criteria to become official?

elements.text: What’s the criteria to become official?

text: It’s arbitrary at the moment but generally I would say that there’s enough trusted members of the community there and with admin/mod permissions that we can ensure it’s a positive envioement
